entry.title: 0.8.6 release candidate 1
entry.summary: On December 9, 2013, a user named Drak brought up the topic of a public announcement about Bitcoin on Bitcointalk.org. They shared a link to a post and asked if it was an official announcement. Wladimir confirmed that it was indeed an official announcement. The content of the announcement is not mentioned, but the conversation suggests that once information is publicly available, it cannot be controlled or prevented from being discussed.
